title: chore: update Electron, @eslint/js, eslint, and globals to latest versions
body:
- Update Electron to 37.2.0
- Update @eslint/js to 9.30.1
- Update eslint to 9.30.1
- Update globals to 16.3.0
- Reviewed Electron 37 breaking changes: no impact on this project
- electron-store not updated due to breaking changes in v9+
- Update com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux.appdata.xml release
